job.title: Senior Data Scientist
job.description: stronguAbout WalrusbrbrustrongMeds need an upgrade Twothirds of Americans are taking Rx meds on a regular basis and pharmacists are the best source of support but people dont have a good way to partner with them Meet Walrus everyones personal pharmacistbrbrWalrus sells into employer and medicare health plans giving everyone on the plan a personal pharmacist to help them make informed decisions about their meds Our pharmacists navigate members through all the complexities of managing their conditions and they work with physicians to keep the whole care team in sync Through Walrus members manage their health save money and improve their qualityoflifebrbrstronguWhat Youll DobrbrustrongWe are looking for a well rounded Senior Data Scientist to build and maintain the data pipeline processing and analysis that ultimately power our pharmacist member and administrative applications This is a high impact role sitting at the intersection of business operations product and engineering solving some of our most difficult challenges As one of the earliest hires on our data team youll play an integral part in shaping the process architecture and roadmap of work to comebrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongul liPartner with other data scientists engineering teams and domain experts to identify and devise roadmaps to maximize core business objectivesli liWork closely with the sales team to identify important questions and answer them with datali liDesign build and launch data extraction transformation and loading processes for pharmaceutical and medical claimsli liBuild and operate infrastructure to ensure data accuracy and availability for all teamsli liWork with technologies such as Docker PostgresSQL Python Pandas and Jupyter We are looking for good engineers regardless of experience with any of these specific technologiesli liCreate reusable and maintainable systems and abstractionsli liHelp to maintain a high technical bar participating in code reviews and design discussionsli liParticipate in recruiting interviewing hiring onboarding and mentoring of new team membersli brbrulstronguRequirementsbrustrongul li8 years experience in Data Science or similar roleli liDemonstrated track record of identifying scoping and leading complex data science projects with crossfunctional teams and high business impactli liExpert knowledge in data modeling concepts and implementationli liExperience with visualization technologies such as Tableau andor Lookerli liProven experience in areas of optimization statistics and machine learningli liDedication to code quality automation and operational excellence unitintegration tests scripts workflowsli liAble to work effectively with ambiguous data and constructs within a fast changing environment and shifting prioritiesli liAbility to balance business needs and make pragmatic decisionsli liBonus Prior highgrowth startup experienceli liBonus Prior experience in pharmaceuticals or health careli liBonus Experience with HIPAA PCI or other high security environmentsli brbrulustrongBenefitsbrstronguul liEquityli liHealth Insuranceli liRemote Positionliul
